content.query:
CREATE VIEW dbo.ventes AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://shkstrbigdata.dfs.core.windows.net/tp2/ventes.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2
)
WITH (
    id_vente INT,
    id_client INT,
    produit NVARCHAR(100),
    montant FLOAT,
    date DATE
) AS rows;
